Teleportation: With the advancement of technology, teleportation becomes a viable option for intercontinental travel. Imagine stepping into a teleportation booth and popping up on the other side of the world in a matter of seconds. No more long flights, layovers, or boring hours spent in airports. Just a simple, quick, and convenient teleportation process.

Space Travel: In a world without planes, space travel becomes the next best option. With the development of advanced spacecraft, you could travel to another continent in a matter of days, enjoying the breathtaking views of Earth from space. Imagine floating in zero gravity, gazing at the curvature of our planet, and witnessing the beauty of space up close.

Hovercraft: Imagine a high-speed hovercraft that could travel across continents with ease. These futuristic vehicles would use magnetic levitation technology to float above the ground, reducing air resistance and allowing for faster travel times. You could travel from one continent to another in a matter of hours, enjoying the stunning views of the landscape below.

Submersibles: In a world without planes, submersibles become the go-to mode of transportation for long-distance travel. Imagine diving deep into the ocean, exploring the wonders of the sea, and reaching your destination on the other side of the world in a matter of days. Submersibles could travel through the ocean at incredible speeds, offering a unique and exciting way to travel.

Folded Space: Imagine a world where space is folded, allowing for easy travel between continents. With the help of advanced technology, scientists could create a folded space-time continuum, allowing you to travel from one continent to another in a matter of seconds. This would revolutionize the way we travel, making it faster, easier, and more convenient than ever before.
